BP.term: negative regulation of steroid biosynthetic process
SREBP-SCAP complex retention in endoplasmic reticulum

negative regulation of fatty acid biosynthetic process

name: insulin induced gene 2

reactome.name: Regulation of cholesterol biosynthesis by SREBP (SREBF)

summary: The protein encoded by this gene is highly similar to the protein product encoded by gene INSIG1. Both INSIG1 protein and this protein are endoplasmic reticulum proteins that block the processing of sterol regulatory element binding proteins (SREBPs) by binding to SREBP cleavage-activating protein (SCAP), and thus prevent SCAP from escorting SREBPs to the Golgi. [provided by RefSeq, Jul 2008].
